Continents / Countries

Aidilon

  • Anschluss: The swamp tribes of the Anschluss welcome few into their turf
  • Evedale: The darkness of Aidilon calls Evedale home, and horrors await within every shadow
  • Hartland: The piney forests beyond Hartland's city walls hide myriad dangers for the unwary adventurer
  • Istovia: The terrain of Istovia is cold, harsh, and rough; just like its people
  • Neeru: Sunken wonders and rising seas dot the landscape at the bottom of the ocean
  • Qurea: The sunny and magical realm of Qurea promises bounty and happiness to all who play its deadly Game
  • Wrakarr: Beware the Gates of Wrakarr: you will never return

Ordan

  • Kharsh: The sun-laiden plains of Kharsh will test your mettle and decide your worth
  • Ku'nogar: A mysterious land to the far east, its secrets shrouded in mist
